#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long lint;
#define mod 1000000007
lint power(lint a, lint n)  //a^n
{
    lint ans=1;
    while(n)
    {
        if(n & 1)
            ans=(ans*a)%mod;
        a=(a*a)%mod;
        n>>=1;
    }
    return ans;
}
void solve(lint n, lint m)
{
    lint ans;
    if(n==1)
        ans=m;
    else
    {
        ans=((m*(m-1))%mod * (power(m-2, n-2)%mod))%mod;
    }
    printf("%lld\n", ans);
}
int main()
{
    int test;
    scanf("%d", &test);
    while(test--)
    {
        lint n, m;
        scanf("%lld %lld", &n, &m);
        solve(n, m);
    }
    return 0;
}
